mapper.sql: id, bucket_name, file_name, url, deleted, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: insert into po_thumbnail (bucket_name, file_name, url, deleted, created_at, updated_at) values ( #{bucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update po_thumbnail set bucket_name = #{bucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
